general_info.summary: This document lists various academic and administrative programs, schools, and resources available at Sharda University. It includes details on the 2025-26 program, different schools (Dental, Medical Sciences & Research, Nursing Science & Research), examination reports, academic initiatives like the Academic Bank of Credits and curricula feedback, university publications, leadership information, statutory bodies, tenders, acts, and COVID-19 related information. It also highlights student support services, skill enhancement programs, entrepreneurship initiatives, FM radio, visa and insurance guidelines, mentoring portals, and international collaborations, including Sharda University Uzbekistan and Agra.

career_path.summary: This text outlines information about a course, including how to apply and the career paths available such as Microbiology Lecturer, Demonstrator, or Lab Technician. It also highlights that students typically receive annual packages between 4.50 LPA and 6.00 LPA and encourages individuals to pursue a career in basic sciences.
career_path.raw_content:
How to apply for the course?
Career path you can choose after the course
• Microbiology Lecturer
• Microbiology Demonstrator
• Microbiology Lab Technician
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in basic sciences.
